We focus our business around paper pulp packaging, pulp (pulp tray & pulp pallet), pulp mold and pulp Molding Machinery. KBD currently has three locations, Dongguan, Foshan, and Suzhou. With years integration and development of advanced technology.CES 2017
Similar Companies:
SLIT AND HOLE INDUSTRY CO., LTD.Unknownn/aSLIT AND HOLE acquired over 25 years of technology experience, and our factory is equipped with large-scale CNC machinery made in Germany, Japan, and U.S.A. We are capable of adapting to versatile trends in the customized industry. We devote ourselves in developing various wedge wire screens and filters for water treatment, pulp and paper, environmental protection, chemical, pharmaceuticals, and food industries.
SensigentUSAPrivateSensigent was formed to commercialize and market advanced technology products based on cutting edge research performed by some of the largest sensor and instrument companies and most respected academic institutions in the world. Our products are used in diverse industries including petrochemical, chemical, food and beverage, packaging materials, plastics, pet food, pulp and paper, medical research, environmental monitoring and many more. Our core competencies are in chemical sensing (e.g. Electronic Nose), radiological sensing, algorithm development including multi-sensor data fusion, and networked systems of sensors. In addition to sensors and instrumentation, we are experts in project and program management, sensor and systems integration, and engineering product development with an emphasis in low power digital design and wireless communication.
TeamvantageUSAPrivateTeamvantage is a full service contract manufacturer who offers complete manufacturing solutions. Our areas of competency and expertise include but are not limited to: engineering design services, mold / tooling design and fabrication, mold and process development, plastic injection molding, micro-molding, silicone molding, machining (metals, plastics, and ceramics), mechanical assembly, product testing, decorating, inspection services, packaging, and complete supply chain management. Teamvantage specializes in the creation and development of manufacturing cells that ultimately run in our customer’s factories. We are ISO 9001:2008 certified, ISO 13485 certified, registered with the FDA, AS 9100C certified, ITAR registered and have over 40 years of manufacturing experience. We specialize in providing highly engineered products to customers in the medical (including implantable devices), aerospace/defense industries as well as other manufacturers that require creative solutions to difficult problems.
MetsoFinlandListedMetso is a leading process performance provider, with customers in the mining, construction, and oil & gas industries. Metso's automation solutions are designed to maximize the profitability of our customers' businesses by improving their production performance and their cost, material and energy efficiency. Metso’s shares are listed on the NASDAQ OMX Helsinki Ltd. Metso employs around 16,000 professionals in 50 countries.
NRLUnited KingdomPrivateNatural Resources Limited (NRL) is bringing to market a viable, wood-fibre based alternative to plastic packaging with sustainable end-of-life characteristics. Over five years of development, NRL have created a patent-protected manufacturing process for producing paper fibre containers that are functional and cost-competitive to plastic alternatives. Containers produced using our unique processes are fully compatible with recycling methods and bio-degradable in the event of being discarded.
ArjowigginsFrancePrivateArjowiggins is a leading producer of paper products. It was listed on the London Stock Exchange and used to be a constituent of the FTSE 100 Index but is now owned by Worms & Cie.

results.title: Company Profile-About Us-Xi'an Kunbaoda Packaging Products Co., Ltd
results.content: KBD PACK PULP MOULD PRODUCTS Co., Ltd., established in 1994, adheres to environmental protection. As its own responsibility, to promote the development and development of green packaging as its mission, determined to become a Chinese Environmental protection packaging enterprises. Since January 2003, the company has successively passed ISO9001 / ISO14000 / ISO18000 / FSC certificate.

KBD PACK PULP MOULD PRODUCTS Co.,Ltd., established in 1994, adheres to environmental protection
As its own responsibility, to promote the development and development of green packaging as its mission, determined to become a Chinese Environmental protection packaging enterprises. Since January 2003, the company has successively passed ISO9001 / ISO14000 / ISO18000 / FSC certificate. At the same time, our products have also obtained the following international Certifications: SGS, rohs, reach and FSC.
The company is mainly engaged in the research and development and production of pulp molding (environmental protection paper pulp tray, pulp card board) packaging products, pulp molding, and the manufacturing of pulp molding machinery and equipment.
The company has more than 20 years of professional technical team, with a number of paper paper pulp product development and design engineers and mature mold technical workers; It has first-class laboratory and paper holder performance testing facilities; It has advanced computer packaging and transportation process simulation software, which ensures the development speed of products and makes the product design novel and unique. Now it can produce products with draft angle ≤ 1.5 ° and chamfer ≤ R1.5, and make the company always occupy the leading level in the industry.
Reasonable cost control; Excellent product design; With high standard delivery speed and perfect pre-sales and after-sales service, the company has become a high-quality supplier for a number of well-known enterprises such as Sony, Panasonic, Flextronics, Huawei, Epson, Philips, HP, Chanel, Dyson and Li Ning.
Corporate culture
1、 Excellent quality, reasonable cost and fine management
2、 Establish and maintain environmental, safety, professional and social responsibility management system
3、 Create value for society; Profit for shareholders; Seek benefits for employees
4、 Quality for survival, innovation for development, business integrity, service for brand
KBD company is always your reliable choice. We are always on the way forward!

A vast neural tracing effort by a team of Janelia scientists has upped the number of fully-traced neurons in the mouse brain by a factor of 10. The GCaMP6 family of GECIs is a collection of green fluorescent indicator proteins that facilitate the measurement of synaptic calcium signals, enabling reliable detection of neuronal responses in vivo.   This photoconvertible protein enables imaging of the calcium activity history of large areas and populations of cells.   They are freely available through the Bloomington Stockcenter through a large coordinated effort from Janelia Drosophila Resources and the National Institutes of Health.
 It is not restricted to the field of view of a microscope, as during real-time calcium imaging.
results.raw_content:
Main Menu (Mobile)- Block
Main Menu - Block
Homepage
Publications
Featured
A vast neural tracing effort by a team of Janelia scientists has upped the number of fully-traced neurons in the mouse brain by a factor of 10. Researchers can now download and browse the data in three dimensions.
These split-GAL4 driver Drosophila lines allow the generation of cell-type specific gene expression. They are freely available through the Bloomington Stockcenter through a large coordinated effort from Janelia Drosophila Resources and the National Institutes of Health.
These bright and photostable fluorescent labels enable imaging and tracking of individual molecules inside living cells.
The GCaMP6 family of GECIs is a collection of green fluorescent indicator proteins that facilitate the measurement of synaptic calcium signals, enabling reliable detection of neuronal responses in vivo.  The next-generation GCaMP6s, GCaMP6m, and GCaMP6f sensors offer increased sensitivity (single action potential detection in vivo) and improved kinetics.
This photoconvertible protein enables imaging of the calcium activity history of large areas and populations of cells.  It is based on EosFP, a fluorescent protein that shows emission changes from green to red upon irradiation with UV light.  It is not restricted to the field of view of a microscope, as during real-time calcium imaging.
This microscope uses a Bessel beam to illuminate a sample with light sheets that are sufficiently thin to achieve isotropic resolution high-speed 3D fluorescent imaging. The technology can visualize cellular processes in spatiotemporal detail not attainable with other fluorescent microscopy techniques.
